Title: The "Women Ship" returns to the harbour
Designer: Hu Dezhi (胡德智)Liang Wancheng (梁万成)
Publisher: Guangxi renmin chubanshe (广西人民出版社)
Notes: A ship called Women Ship (妇女号), with women (possibly Tanka, 蜑家) on board, returns to the harbor, loaded with fish. It is unclear whether the image has been designed to mark a special or specific event.
